item.title: Add Bruzu.com
item.description: https://bruzu.com/ - Automate Image production. Generate tons of Image variants with API, Integrations or nocode sheet. API is FREE with watermark.

item.title: Adapt Messaging header -> Messaging and Streaming
Add eyeson API
item.description: https://apiservice.eyeson.com/api-pricing - - A video communication API service based on WebRTC (SFU, MCU) to build video platforms. Allows RealTime Data Injection, Video Layouts, Recordings, a fully featured hosted web UI (quickstart) or packages for custom UIs. Has a [free tier for developers](https://apiservice.eyeson.com/api-pricing) with 1000 meeting minutes a month.

item.title: Revert "Remove Okteto Cloud"
item.description: https://okteto.com - - Managed Kubernetes service designed for remote development. Free developer accounts come with 5 Kubernetes namespaces, 3Gi/pod with a maximum of 8Gi/namespace, 1CPU/pod with a maximum of 4CPUs/namespace and 5GB Disk space. The apps sleep after 24 hours of inactivity.

item.title: Added Nhost
item.description: https://nhost.io) - Serverless backend for web and mobile apps. Free plan includes: PostgreSQL, GraphQL (Hasura - Serverless backend for web and mobile apps. Free plan includes: PostgreSQL, GraphQL (Hasura), Authentication, Storage, and Serverless Functions.

item.title: Update localhost.direct
item.description: https://get.localhost.direct - A better *.localhost.direct Wildcard public CA signed SSL cert for localhost development with sub-domain support

item.title: remove the endless hosting they looked like they don't operate anymore
adding budibase under BaaS. I think, we should have Low Code section
item.description: https://budibase.com/ - Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s
